mapper.sql: MERCHANT_NO, MERCHANT_NAME, STATUS, ACCOUNT_NAME, BANK_NAME, BANK_NO, ADMIN_NAME, ID_NO, email, MOBILE,support_phone, AGREEMENT_NO, START_TIME, END_TIME, REMARK, CREATED_BY, UPDATED_BY, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from UMS_MERCHANT
order by ${orderByClause}

select
from UMS_MERCHANT where email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and status = 1
mapper.insert: insert into UMS_MERCHANT (MERCHANT_NO, MERCHANT_NAME, STATUS, ACCOUNT_NAME, BANK_NAME, BANK_NO, ADMIN_NAME, ID_NO, email, MOBILE,support_phone, AGREEMENT_NO, START_TIME, END_TIME, REMARK, CREATED_BY, UPDATED_BY, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME ) values (mall_merchant_seq.Nextval, #{merchantName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{accountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adminName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supportPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{agreementNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

mapper.update:
update UMS_MERCHANT
MERCHANT_NO = #{record.merchantNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MERCHANT_NAME = #{record.merchantName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ACCOUNT_NAME = #{record.accountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BANK_NAME = #{record.bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BANK_NO = #{record.bankNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADMIN_NAME = #{record.adminName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ID_NO = #{record.idNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{record.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MOBILE = #{record.mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
support_phone = #{record.supportPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AGREEMENT_NO = #{record.agreementNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
START_TIME = #{record.startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
END_TIME = #{record.endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REMARK = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_BY = #{record.createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATED_BY = #{record.updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update UMS_MERCHANT set MERCHANT_NO = #{record.merchantNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MERCHANT_NAME = #{record.merchantName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ACCOUNT_NAME = #{record.accountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BANK_NAME = #{record.bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BANK_NO = #{record.bankNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADMIN_NAME = #{record.adminName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ID_NO = #{record.idNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{record.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOBILE = #{record.mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, support_phone = #{record.supportPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AGREEMENT_NO = #{record.agreementNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, START_TIME = #{record.startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, END_TIME = #{record.endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARK = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_BY = #{record.createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED_BY = #{record.updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

update UMS_MERCHANT set MERCHANT_NAME = #{merchantName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ACCOUNT_NAME = #{accountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BANK_NAME = #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BANK_NO = #{bankNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADMIN_NAME = #{adminName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ID_NO = #{idNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, support_phone = #{supportPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AGREEMENT_NO = #{agreementNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, START_TIME = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, END_TIME = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where MERCHANT_NO = #{merchantNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where MERCHANT_NO = #{merchantNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
